this means all 40kmh school zones will be in force across the whole state
non-government schools have the option to determine what days are programed as pupil-free meaning where one school in a zone might be closed another might be operational
drivers may not know if the school they are driving past is having a pupil-free day or if students are at school that's why all 40kmh school zones are in force
children's safety to and from school is an important road safety issue kids are vulnerable because of their small size and lack of experience
the majority of school zones operate between 8-9 30am and 2 30pm-4pm on gazetted school days
there are a small number of non-standard school zone times in new south wales
these zones are identified by red orange school zone signs which indicate non-standard times
many people believe kids are most likely to get in trouble at night or on the weekends but it is really the after-school hours that law enforcement worries about
